text:
@GOP Please. Trump thought that drinking or injecting Clorox would cure us of COVID19.  He was asked by HANNITY what his plans were for an imaginary second term and he wandered without ever addressing it.  Lets see in the debate, shall we?

What I know is that nothing is sticking
